title: Welcome to My Website
text: Welcome to my Quarto website. — title: “Welcome to My Website” author: “徐迈虹” date: “2025-01-24” format: html: theme: journal toc: true

title: Welcome to My Website
text:
About Me
I am currently pursuing my master’s degree in Business Analytics at Boston University, after completing my undergraduate studies at the University of South Carolina and Boston University. My studies focus on quantitative analysis, decision-making, and marketing analytics.

title: Welcome to My Website
text:
Projects

“Lobster Land” Winter Carnival
During the Pandemic
- Analyzed event data using Tableau and designed interactive dashboards. - Applied logistic regression to extract key insights for marketing strategies and brand optimization.


Airbnb Pricing Prediction for New Orleans
Fall 2024
- Built a multiple regression model to predict Airbnb listing prices based on property characteristics. - Optimized the model for accurate pricing strategies, achieving an R² of 0.5069.

title: Welcome to My Website
text:
Skills & Tools

Programming: SQL, Python, R, Tableau, Power BI, Excel (VBA, VLOOKUP, INDEX)
Data Analysis: Logistic Regression, Statistical Modeling, Data Visualization
Business Skills: Market Analysis, Brand Optimization, Marketing Strategy
